meanings.definition: A shop where tea is sold and sometimes served.
meanings.sent1: I love to visit the teashop with my friends to try different types of tea.
meanings.sent2: The teashop on the corner has a cozy atmosphere and a wide selection of teas.
meanings.sent3: After a long day, I dream of a magical teashop where the tea never runs out.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a teashop of thoughts, each one waiting to be brewed into a new idea.
meanings.sent5: The teashop was a haven of tranquility amidst the bustling city streets.

meanings.definition: To visit or frequent a teashop.
meanings.sent1: Every weekend, we teashop together to relax and chat.
meanings.sent2: She loves to teashop in different neighborhoods to discover hidden gems.
meanings.sent3: I teashopped so often that the teashop owner knew my order before I even spoke.
meanings.sent4: In her dreams, she would teashop in far-off lands, tasting exotic teas.
meanings.sent5: Teashopping became her favorite pastime, a ritual of comfort and joy.
